#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d%d",&t,&n);
    
    while(t--)
    {
        int x,y;
        
        scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
        
        int sum = 1,i;
        
        for(i=1;i<=y;i++)
        {
            sum = (sum * (x%n)) % n;
        }
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
